attributes.action: Not grant a state funeral to Margaret Thatcher.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent speculation that former Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher would be given a state funeral is an insult to the many people of Britain who suffered under her regime.
This is a request that a state funeral for Margaret Thatcher be denied.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
